body_html: It's for both truncated BPTT and architectures using LSTM decoders. In the second case, the cells are initialized with some encoded activation. For an example see: Skip-Thought Vectors (Kiros et al. 2015).
body_text: It's for both truncated BPTT and architectures using LSTM decoders. In the second case, the cells are initialized with some encoded activation. For an example see: Skip-Thought Vectors (Kiros et al. 2015).
body: It's for both truncated BPTT and architectures using LSTM decoders. In the second case, the cells are initialized with some encoded activation. For an example see: Skip-Thought Vectors (Kiros et al. 2015).
